Monday: Breakfast: 1 small apple, 1 slice of whole grain bread, 1 tablespoon of peanut butter
Lunch: 1 cup of mixed greens with 1/2 cup of cherry tomatoes, 3 ounces of grilled chicken breast, 1 tablespoon of balsamic vinaigrette
Dinner: 4 ounces of baked salmon, 1/2 cup of quinoa, 1 cup of steamed broccoli
Snack: 1 small banana, 1 ounce of almonds
Tuesday: Breakfast: 1 cup of cooked oatmeal with 1/2 cup of mixed berries and 1 tablespoon of chia seeds
Lunch: 1 cup of vegetable stir-fry with 3 ounces of tofu, 1/2 cup of brown rice
Dinner: 4 ounces of grilled chicken breast, 1 cup of roasted vegetables
Snack: 1 cup of low-fat yogurt with 1/4 cup of granola

Monday: Breakfast: 2 slices of whole grain bread, 2 scrambled eggs, 1/2 avocado
Lunch: 1 cup of mixed greens with 1/4 cup of feta cheese, 1/4 cup of olives, 1 tablespoon of vinaigrette dressing
Dinner: 6 ounces of grilled fish, 1 cup of roasted vegetables, 1/2 cup of quinoa
Snack: 1 medium apple, 1 ounce of mixed nuts

Lunch: 1 cup of vegetable curry with 1/2 cup of brown rice
Dinner: 6 ounces of grilled chicken breast, 1 cup of steamed broccoli, 1/2 cup of cooked pasta
Snack: 1 cup of Greek yogurt with 1/4 cup of mixed berries

Monday: Breakfast: 2 slices of whole grain bread, 3 scrambled eggs, 1/2 avocado
Lunch: 1 cup of mixed greens with 1/2 cup of roasted vegetables, 4 ounces of grilled steak, 2 tablespoons of vinaigrette dressing
Dinner: 8 ounces of baked fish, 1 cup of quinoa, 1 cup of steamed vegetables

Tuesday: Breakfast: 1 cup of cooked brown rice with 1/2 cup of mixed vegetables and 4 ounces of grilled tofu
Lunch: 1 cup of vegetable stir-fry with 1 cup of cooked noodles and 6 ounces of shrimp
